Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Mathematical \Math`e*mat"ic*al\, a. [See {Mathematic}.] Of or pertaining to mathematics; according to mathematics; hence, theoretically precise; accurate; as, mathematical geography; mathematical instruments; mathematical exactness. -- {Math`e*mat"ic*al*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]
mathematically adv : with respect to mathematics; "mathematically impossible"
